fulltext:
Nguyen Binh Nguyen
Software Engineer
EXPERIENCE
Ringblaze, Texas, US ( Full-time remote)
- Software Engineer
JAN 2018 - PRESENT
- Building the profes sional phone system for business. Implemented 40%
functionals of the system, includes :
Backend APIs using NodeJS, Sequelize ORM on PostgresDB.
Frontend using React JS /Graphql.
Mobile app Android andioS using ReactNative.
- Interview candidates to build the dev team of 3.
- Adopt the TDD process which covered the tested code to 95 %.
- Write tools which currently helps to save more than 20 minutes of each
developer/day.
- Do the code review on every pullrequests.
AgencyRevolution, HCM, VN - Software Engineer
JAN 2017 - JAN 2018
Familiar working with Google Cloud services: Kubernertes, Cloud
Function, Pub/Sub, Logging.
- Implement the parts of a high scale Microservices system, includes:
Design the APls, the microservices workflow then implement in
Golang and Nodejs.
Frontend development using ReactJS/ Redux/ FlowJS/ ImmutableJs.
Adopted DraftJS to build the WYsiwYG postcard builder within a
request queue.
Write reusable NosQL query on RethinkDB and Redis.
Write code for the monitoring service, collecting the logs and send
to InfluxDB or Slack.
Implement 2 public webhooks by Google Cloud Function.
Write the unit test; integration test follows the TDD process.
- On call for any incident may happen during the night.
- Develop and maintain 2/6 open APIs written in Golang which were
receiving hundreds of thousands of requests every day from the
partners.
- Identifying and resolving performance and scalability issues.
- In the role of a cross-functional developer in a Scrum team
- Do the code review, mob programming and pair programming.
- Were developing many core soft skils under the high working pressure:
teamwork, negotiating, problem -solving, helpful code review.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
- Languages: Javascript ES6 with
NodeJS/ ReactJS/ Redux/ Flow/ Jest,
ReactNative, AngularJS 1. Golang.
- Google Cloud services:
Kubemetes, Pub/Sub, SQL, Cloud
Function, Compute Engine,
Logging, Storage.
- Databases: Sequelize ORM
(Postgres), Waterline ORM
(MongoDB), RethinkDB, InfluxDB,
Redis.
- Dev tools: Docker, Git, Vim editor,
Debuggers, Mac/Linux CLIS
AWARDS
Build a practical Vehicle Routing
Solver, hosted by Honestbee - Nov
2016. As a team of 3, we won the ist
prize in this hackathon.
REFERENCES
Mr. Le Thanh Thuong - Former
Data Architecture & Analysis Manager
at ME Corporation
https://vn.linkedin.com/in/thương
-lê-thanh-a8938567
Mr. Victor Andres Aguirre
Fernandez - Former Product
Development Manager at Memeapp
https://tw.linkedin.com/in/victorag
uirref/en
Sonice.vn, HCM, VN - Lead Developer
JAN 2016 - JAN 2017
Hiring the dev team of 5, learning Scrum and apply to the product
development.
As a Scrum Master, training team member to able to work.
Join "The design sprint" (http://www.gv.com/sprint/) to defining
the product.
Responsible for the development of 2 company products: a market place
- memeapp.co and an e-commerce site - sonice.vn, includes:
Implement backend APIs using NodeJS, Waterline ORM on
MongoDB.
Implement Frontend Progressive Web Apps using Google Polymer.
ME Corporation, HCM, VN - Software Engineer
SEP 2013 - DEC 2015
Lead the frontend team, work with the backend team to define the data
model and build the APIs, monitor the app and optimizing.
- Creating complex, responsive UI with JS and Bootstrap
- Adopt AngularJS 1.0 to create the app running on Chrome, Firefox and
Internet Explorer.
- Implement the real-time data visualization with Highcharts,
Fusioncharts, Google charts over Socketio.
NCT Corporation, HCM, VN - Mobile Application Developer
JAN 2013 - AUG 2013
Created a music application on BlackBery 1o.
- Write in C++ on Cascade framework.
- Design the app structure follows the object-oriented programming.
Reference: https://appworld.blackberry.com/webstore/content/2897089o
FPT Software, Da Nang, VN - Inte rnship Java Developer
JUL 2012 - DEC 2012
Intern Java developer in a Japan outsourcing project.
Create the business diagram for 2 assigned pages in the site.
- Write SQL query and Java code to implement the features.
EDUCATION
Vietnam Korea Friendship Infomation Technology College, Da Nang -
Associate's degree in Computer Science - Distinction
SEP 2009 - JUN 2012
- Leam the solid foundation of programming, operating system concepts,
Linux usage, and mobile development.
Develop soft skills by voluntary being a leader of the university school
forum and other voluntary activities.

educations.school: Vietnam Korea Friendship Infomation Technology College
educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
Building the profes sional phone system for business. Implemented 40% functionals of the system, includes : Backend APIs using NodeJS, Sequelize ORM on PostgresDB. Frontend using React JS /Graphql. Mobile app Android andioS using ReactNative. - Interview candidates to build the dev team of 3. - Adopt the TDD process which covered the tested code to 95 %. - Write tools which currently helps to save more than 20 minutes of each developer/day.
- Do the code review on every pullrequests.

Familiar working with Google Cloud services: Kubernertes, Cloud Function, Pub/Sub, Logging. - Implement the parts of a high scale Microservices system, includes:
Design the APls, the microservices workflow then implement in
Golang and Nodejs. Frontend development using ReactJS/ Redux/ FlowJS/ ImmutableJs. Adopted DraftJS to build the WYsiwYG postcard builder within a request queue.
Write reusable NosQL query on RethinkDB and Redis. Write code for the monitoring service, collecting the logs and send to InfluxDB or Slack. Implement 2 public webhooks by Google Cloud Function. Write the unit test; integration test follows the TDD process.
- On call for any incident may happen during the night.
- Develop and maintain 2/6 open APIs written in Golang which were receiving hundreds of thousands of requests every day from the partners.
- Identifying and resolving performance and scalability issues.
- In the role of a cross-functional developer in a Scrum team
- Do the code review, mob programming and pair programming.
- Were developing many core soft skils under the high working pressure: teamwork, negotiating, problem -solving, helpful code review.
